net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.graphics
Class Anim

All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class Anim
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable

Give MDO, receive animation. Animation is a filmstrip made of frames from a spritesheet. They can be merged together to produce a character sprite.

Constructor Detail

Anim

public Anim(AnimationMDO mdo,
            MapObject parent)
Deprecated. 
Creates a new animation, supposedly ready to render. Make sure the relevant file has been loaded from the asset manager first.

Parameters:
mdo - The data necessary for crafting an animation
parent - The map object this anim is tied to
Method Detail

render

public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: Renderable
Render yourself to the screen using OpenGL. Nothing needs to be passed here because OpenGL is one giant statemachine clusterfuck.

Specified by:
render in interface Renderable
Parameters:
camera - The camera to render with, may or may not be used
